Title: Relates to requiring certain health insurance issuers to certify that at least a majority of prescription drug rebates are provided to patients at the point of sale
Summary: Requires certain health insurance issuers to certify that at least a majority of prescription drug rebates are provided to patients at the point of sale.
LawCode: Add §§3246 & 4331, Ins L; add §4417, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to requiring certain health insurance issuers to certify that at least a majority of prescription drug rebates are provided to patients at the point of sale
